pkgmetadata.longdescription: Learning graphical models with hubs // Implements the hub graphical lasso and hub covariance graph proposal by Tan, KM., London, P., Mohan, K., Lee, S-I., Fazel, M., and Witten, D. (2014). Learning graphical models with hubs. To appear in Journal of Machine Learning Research. arXiv.org/pdf/1402.7349.pdf.
